type: Superalgos Review - Crypto TradingBot platform from the future

definition.text: I only made it past the first tutorial so far but I am blown away by the potential of this platform. Powerful and flexible, I am amazed this is free to use.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use doscs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
